ygData.subject: Re[2]: [warriors_eq] (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: Can someone get me started on the Goblin necklaces quest in Halas? Just maybe the name of the guy to start talking to? I tried talking to a couple different
ygData.messageBody:
Can someone get me started on the Goblin necklaces quest in Halas?
Just maybe the name of the guy to start talking to? I tried talking to
a couple different people but never seem to get anywhere.

Thanks in advance

Akiro
lv 8 Barbarian Warrior
May the Six Hammers Guard your way


______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] (no subject)
Author: <warriors_eq@onelist.com > at IPNET

From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>


>From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>

<SNIP>

well there are lowlevel quest worth doin.
The ongoing ones are great.
like the bone collecting of the shadowwarriors
and the necklace collection for barbarian warriors

vashi

>5. never messed much with quest, yet to see or hear of a low level quest
>that is actually worth the time and effort.
>
>Salr D'Taynkk
>Dark Warrior of The Kith
>Veeshan
>
> >>> "Dean B." <gino_14@...> 5.17.99 8:31:24 PM >>>
>From: "Dean B." <gino_14@...>
>
>Hail All !
>Not To brag - I'm a Human, Warrior(lvl 10) and I just got this game about
>one month ago. I'm still getting used to it's lingo and such-forth but I'm
>having a few questions/help/input thats on my mind.
>
>
>1. Now, I need a magical sword, so that I can kill Wisp's... I'm thinking
>about investing into a 'Combined 2H Sword'. I've herd they can very from
>75pp - 120pp. I'm wondering where I can get it.
>
>P.S Where is the best place to hunt wisp's. (I've herd they offer good
>money
>drops)
>
>
>2. For a lvl 10, I have RingMail tunic, RingMail pants & RingMail
>sleeve's.
> I've switched to RingMail couse I've found there a little bit less then
>Banded Mail and you get the same AC but a little more weight. I've also
>noticed that with RingMail that monsters tend to miss a bit more and I
>dodge
>more quicker then Banded Mail.
>
>
>3. When I reach lvl 12, What does perry skill do?
>
>
>4. I was wondering, I have a Kite Shield and one Mino Battle Axe. When I
>get dule wielding, I'll buy another Mino Battle Axe... Is there some way I
>can contact a lvl35+ Enchanter and he/she could make my Mino Battle Axe
>magical somehow OR even make the delay better?
>
>
>5. Ok, I'm having trouble with some quest's... What are good ones that
>offer good money, Experience Points & and a all around good item?
>
> Thanks for reading my newbie questions!
> Dean Boyle
>
>Server: Karana
>Name: Dealan <The Light of Norrath>
